评论详情: I love the bag. I needed something that was everyday wearable and fit my phone keys wallet and lip product. I carry any extra items in my diaper bag. This bag is great super y2k and goes with a lot of my clothes. I recommend. I would buy it in brown too!

I really like this bag, i wanted to use it for a day trip somewhere and i needed a little handbag. it has a lot more room than i expected actually but it does not have pockets inside which i wish there was but its still great  and i could see what people meant by the material feels a bit cheap but honestly its still really great quality. i got it in coffee brown and i actually like this bag a lot. keep in mind the buckle is actually a buckle and you have to unravel it to open. overall i really like this bag i will use ut a lot i definitely recommend
This purse is perfect for going out and it fits your iPhone, which I love because I always have to have my phone with me
Bag was stained and had cracks in it. Looked like it had been pre used. Super cute but now can’t use it anymore.
granddaughter loved the color

This bag is cute looking at it from a distance. Faux leather is very thin/cheap looking. Zipper broke the second time I’ve used this bag, I was able to get it back on somehow but have to be very careful pulling it to open and close. The bag smells so disgustingly bad, like fake plastic but it has a fishy smell?!? >,< I’ve worn it out twice hoping it would “air out” but the smell hasn’t gone away. Probably would never buy this bag again.

I got this purse for my daughter because she liked all of the buckles and hardware on the purse.  Unfortunately, the construction of the purse isn't the greatest and the material is so thin that it probably won’t last long. It does have a decent amount of space on the inside of the bag, so it can hold all of your going-out needs. To that point, she said she will mostly use this bag when going to crowded bars or parties where she won't have to worry about it getting lost or damaged.  For a ~$20 bag, that seems about right. It's not going to be the centerpiece of your accessory collection, but is serviceable as an inexpensive, sacrificial tote.

The faux leather material of this purse is definitely not the best but it's not a bad option for daily wear and when you need a change in accessory. The buckle details and exterior design are very trendy and the dark maroon color looks cute. The inside is spacious enough to fit a phone, wallet and some other smaller trinkets but there is no other storage compartments inside or outside so you only have one main zipper pocket. Because of the style you do have to unbuckle the front every time you want to open or close the zip which can be pretty inconvenient.
Color is nice and size is perfect. What is lacking is interior and exterior pockets to put things in. Material is soft and zipper is smooth but wish there was more pockets to put small things.
